properties.name: Leeds Hackspace
properties.description: We're Leeds Hackspace! A workshop and craft space for people who like making things, are curious about how stuff works, or would like to learn new skills, based in lovely Leeds.

properties.name: GoM / Lucy
properties.description: For those who were Guild of Makers members and friends. Please message Lucy (Twitter / Bluesky, Via web site / linkedin etc DrLucyRogers ) if you'd like to reserve a spot. It won't be near the ducks.

properties.name: 2016's worst village
properties.description: A group of people from Bristol camping together with a loosely planned collection of our nonsense. You may have played Mario Kart with us in 2012, or listened to Simon Singh narrate us totally failing to light a barbecue in 2016.

properties.description: We are bunch of hackers from all around the world who are into food, drinks and bio, experimenting wildly and enjoying each others presence.

properties.description: A group of friends, most of whom are involved with the Puzzle Hunt, but some aren't. We're also mostly software engineers and mostly based in London. The village name is a tribute to everyone's favourite 1990s virtual assistant.

properties.name: Dogsbody HQ

Being soft is a revolutionary act. A tapestry of transfeminine-leaning internet communities. Formerly known as the Cuddly Catgirl Collective and femcamp.

properties.name: Making Happiness
properties.description: A group of enthusiastic people from the Netherlands; looking for ways to immaterialise happiness.

properties.name: Milliways
properties.description:
Milliways is a group of information security specialists at hacker camps. 

We bring large infrastructure which we plan and built ourselves. The intercontinental logistics include self constructed installations.

properties.name: Poorly Located Prog
properties.description: An erratic collection of makers, burners, goths and hippies from Cambridge here to have a good time and bring chaos and/or prog to EMF.

properties.name: Koala Programming
properties.description: A small group formed when two loosely connected communities accidentally realised they'd both have attendees at EMF. Not really anything to do with Koalas, and not everyone is a programmer either. Naming things is hard!

properties.name: Swansea Hackspace
properties.description: A bunch of folks from Swansea Hackspace. We will be bringing lots of phones, radios and possibly a fax machine. Interests in electronics, radio, sewing, crafts, programming and making in general!
